titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation appointing the flags, aswell for our nauie royall, as for the ships of our subiects of south and north Britaine.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie: and by the assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Greenewich, this fifth day of May, in the tenth yeere of our reigne ... .
Arms 11; Steele notation: the other obedi-.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
